title: RumViewEvent
description: Schema of all properties of a View event

loading_time.description: Duration in ns to the view is considered loaded

loading_type.description: Type of the loading of the view

time_spent.description: Time spent on the view in ns

first_contentful_paint.description: Duration in ns to the first rendering

largest_contentful_paint.description: Duration in ns to the largest contentful paint

largest_contentful_paint_target_selector.description: CSS selector path of the largest contentful paint element

first_input_delay.description: Duration in ns of the first input event delay

first_input_time.description: Duration in ns to the first input

first_input_target_selector.description: CSS selector path of the first input target element

interaction_to_next_paint.description: Longest duration in ns between an interaction and the next paint

interaction_to_next_paint_target_selecto.description: CSS selector path of the interacted element corresponding to INP

cumulative_layout_shift.description: Total layout shift score that occurred on the view

cumulative_layout_shift_target_selector.description: CSS selector path of the first element (in document order) of the largest layout shift contributing to CLS

dom_complete.description: Duration in ns to the complete parsing and loading of the document and its sub resources

dom_content_loaded.description: Duration in ns to the complete parsing and loading of the document without its sub resources

dom_interactive.description: Duration in ns to the end of the parsing of the document

load_event.description: Duration in ns to the end of the load event handler execution

first_byte.description: Duration in ns to the response start of the document request

custom_timings.description: User custom timings of the view. As timing name is used as facet path, it must contain only letters, digits, or the characters - _ . @ $

is_active.description: Whether the View corresponding to this event is considered active

is_slow_rendered.description: Whether the View had a low average refresh rate

action.description: Properties of the actions of the view

count.description: Number of actions that occurred on the view

error.description: Properties of the errors of the view

count.description: Number of errors that occurred on the view

crash.description: Properties of the crashes of the view

count.description: Number of crashes that occurred on the view

long_task.description: Properties of the long tasks of the view

count.description: Number of long tasks that occurred on the view

frozen_frame.description: Properties of the frozen frames of the view

count.description: Number of frozen frames that occurred on the view

resource.description: Properties of the resources of the view

count.description: Number of resources that occurred on the view

frustration.description: Properties of the frustrations of the view

count.description: Number of frustrations that occurred on the view

in_foreground_periods.description: List of the periods of time the user had the view in foreground (focused in the browser)

items.description: Properties of the foreground period of the view

start.description: Duration in ns between start of the view and start of foreground period

duration.description: Duration in ns of the view foreground period

memory_average.description: Average memory used during the view lifetime (in bytes)

memory_max.description: Peak memory used during the view lifetime (in bytes)

cpu_ticks_count.description: Total number of cpu ticks during the view’s lifetime

cpu_ticks_per_second.description: Average number of cpu ticks per second during the view’s lifetime

refresh_rate_average.description: Average refresh rate during the view’s lifetime (in frames per second)

refresh_rate_min.description: Minimum refresh rate during the view’s lifetime (in frames per second)

flutter_raster_time.description: Time taken for Flutter to rasterize the view.

js_refresh_rate.description: The JavaScript refresh rate for React Native

is_active.description: Whether this session is currently active. Set to false to manually stop a session

sampled_for_replay.description: Whether this session has been sampled for replay

document_version.description: Version of the update of the view event

page_states.description: List of the page states during the view

start.description: Duration in ns between start of the view and start of the page state

records_count.description: The number of records produced during this view lifetime

segments_count.description: The number of segments sent during this view lifetime

segments_total_raw_size.description: The total size in bytes of the segments sent during this view lifetime

configuration.description: Subset of the SDK configuration options in use during its execution

start_session_replay_recording_manually.description: Whether session replay recording configured to start manually

max_depth.description: Distance between the top and the lowest point reached on this view (in pixels)

max_depth_scroll_top.description: Page scroll top (scrolled distance) when the maximum scroll depth was reached for this view (in pixels)

max_scroll_height.description: Maximum page scroll height (total height) for this view (in pixels)

max_scroll_height_time.description: Duration between the view start and the time the max scroll height was reached for this view (in nanoseconds)
